		Subject: Transgaz - TIBIEL - unused guarantees

		 

		Dear Partners,

		 

		At the present date, TIBIEL appears in our records with unused guarantees in amount of 51,964.62 LEI, set up in Transgaz’ account for the balancing and VTP access contracts related to the previous gas years.

		 

		We would like to inform you that you have the option to request the return of such guarantees or their transfer to the ongoing balancing and VTP access contract for the gas year 2023-2024.

		 

		At the same time, in making the return/transfer decision, please take into account your company's forecasts regarding deficit-type imbalances that may determine the need to supplement the current guarantee, according to the contractual provisions of Art.  71 respectively "In the situation where the value of the cumulative imbalance is of «Deficit» type, its value cannot exceed the value of the guarantee for balancing established by the NU.

		 

		Best regards,

		 

		Transgaz' team
